participant_1.name: Raj Patel
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, Raj enjoys pushing boundaries and exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Isabella Cortez
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about the arts, Isabella brings a unique perspective to everything she does.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college.

content.text: music is fun but i d rather swim
